alert.note: Alert for Upper Tanana Valley and the Fortymile Country (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 15 at 1:41PM AKST until December 16 at 12:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT AKST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Light snow occuring with an additional inch of accumulation expected. Storm total snow accumulation of 8 to 12 inches. Gusty northwest winds up to 25 mph this afternoon and evening from Tok to Northway may reduce visibility one half mile or less in blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Along the Alaska Highway. * WHEN...Until midnight AKST tonight. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions creating difficult travel conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Gusty northwest winds are expected to taper off after midnight tonight.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible.

area.areaDesc: Upper Tanana Valley and the Fortymile Country
